ygData.subject: Re: Bard sit in or Mana Song walkout or whatever (long,  possibly rant ish)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They nerfed it well before release I m afraid. To get an idea of how well it worked in beta, check out this screenshot I saved from my BB days in P4.
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, Dec 03/99, Donny Dane <ddane@...> wrote:

> Wouldn't know - been playing since day two of release, and am still only
> 20th level. I guess I'm sorry I didn't try to powerlevel up, so I could
> have actually used some of the songs before they nerfed them to uselessness.
> Of course, they seem to have fixed others, so maybe I still have something
> to look forward to.

They nerfed it well before release I'm afraid. To get an idea of how
well it worked in beta, check out this screenshot I saved from my BB
days in P4.

http://www.bogon.com/~jhenders/lullaby1.jpg
